title: Just when you thought ranked couldn't get any worse
body:
The outcome of 9/10 games is now decided by which team's bottom lane is auto-filled.

I no longer have to only worry about someone being complete and utter shit at the role they wanted to play, but also others being complete and utter shit at a role they don't know how to play and didn't want to play.

It's like you're making a serious effort to fuck up ranked more with every passing season.
